description: Ready-To-Go Hashtag Set from LENS AI. Can be used for free for both commercial and personal uses. Boost your SEO or organic reach by applying these keywords or understand the latest trend of niche topic.

session.heading: Not Enough of topic? Not Enough of hashtag? Want real time hashtag?
items: Customize the followed niche of your account
Full access to customized Instagram trend analysis reports
Contribute your AI model to the community library

guide.heading: How to make hashtag suggestion
guide.subheading: Make your own hashtag recommendation model in around 10 minutes.

createAccount.heading: Create an Instagram account
createAccount.content: Create a new Instagram account on your device.

followNiche.heading: Follow niche
followNiche.content: Follow other interesting pages as you use Instagram as usual. We will take that area as your category for the Instabot.

connectInstabot.heading: Connect Insta-bot with us
connectInstabot.content: Enter your Instagram account details in our system. Wait for a moment for the Instabot to run. You are all set.
